body: Wherever possible, cache properties using [`cached_property`](https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/blob/branch-0.15/python/cudf/cudf/utils/utils.py#L310) to avoid computing them every time they are needed.

comments.body: We should also update the code to use [`functools.cached_property`](https://docs.python.org/dev/library/functools.html?highlight=s#functools.cached_property) rather than our own implementation for Python >= 3.8. @rgsl888prabhu

This issue has been labeled `inactive-90d` due to no recent activity in the past 90 days. Please close this issue if no further response or action is needed. Otherwise, please respond with a comment indicating any updates or changes to the original issue and/or confirm this issue still needs to be addressed.
